channel.title: Need forums or sig/avy? READ!
channel.description:
Are you a succesfull server with no forums? do you want forums? well I can help. I've recently had some trouble in my 2nd server and need some serious help. If you help me get my server up and running ill create you a brand new forum from whatever host you want.
i also can make good GFX and Animations aswell. So if you need a signature+avvy to go on these forums help me!!
